QuestData.Title: Trust of a King
QuestData.Description:
Well, now dat you are settled in, you had best go speak with my father. You can find him up upon de throne, his advisors close at hand, pouring poison in his ear, no doubt.
De lift behind you can take you to de Golden Throne above us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with King Rastakhan at the Golden Throne.
QuestData.RewardText: Very prompt. Now, I have need of your hands.
